name: Affiliaters Whatsapp API
description: A simple way to convert your WA account to an API. Open the URL at the path `/auth/getqr`.

WA_SESSION_DATA.description: The Base64 encoded string of the session.data.json file. This heroku app is designed to be stateless so you no session details survive a redployment. Run `npx @open-wa/wa-automate --disable-spins -o` to generate a session.data.json file.
